author: pamarcelot
msg: o Added a target for Solaris PKG installers, Refactored the Mac OS X PKG installer package name.
o Fix for DIRSERVER-1112 (ApacheDS installer creates redundant server.xml file).
o Fixed a bug in the Windows Installer which caused the user to be asked if he wants to launch the default instance even if he has chosen to not install a default instance.
